0.smallLine: Fast. Secure. Reliable. — We move your time-critical shipments across the globe, 24/7.

1.smallLine: Our 24/7 Onboard Courier team ensures the fastest, safest, and most transparent hand-carry delivery from pickup to final handover.

2.smallLine: Your urgent shipment is personally escorted door-to-door, monitored in real time, and delivered exactly when you need it.

AboutSection.label: About Us
AboutSection.title: About OBC Care
AboutSection.subtitle: Your Global Partner in Time-Critical Logistics
AboutSection.p1: At OBC Care, we move what matters most: from production spare parts and AOG shipments to automotive components and electronic equipment.
AboutSection.p2: We're trusted by businesses worldwide to handle high-value, urgent shipments with precision, reliability, and full transparency.

0.title: Multi-Industry Logistics Solutions
0.description: We specialize in mission-critical deliveries for aircraft parts, industrial spares, electronics, fashion items, and sensitive documents worldwide.

1.title: Complete Door-to-Door Service
1.description: From pickup to handover, every stage is managed by our professional team with care and accuracy.

2.title: Global Reach, Local Expertise
2.description: With a worldwide network of trusted partners, we deliver seamlessly across continents and time zones.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: Stay informed at every milestone. Our OBC team keeps you updated in real time, from pick-up to final delivery.

LogisticsAdvantage.label: Our Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.title: Fast, Secure, and Global — Our Logistics Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.subtitle: Your deadlines drive us.
LogisticsAdvantage.p1: OBC Care provides end-to-end logistics solutions designed for industries that can’t afford delays: <bold>aviation, automotive, and electronics.</bold>
LogisticsAdvantage.p2: We coordinate first and last mile deliveries, onboard couriers, customs clearance, and next-flight-out (NFO) arrangements to ensure every shipment arrives when it's needed most.
LogisticsAdvantage.p3: Whether it's across the city or across the world, we move faster, think smarter, and deliver with care.

ServicesCTA.title: Need a Time-Critical Delivery?
ServicesCTA.description: Whether it’s an urgent aircraft part or a last-minute production component, we deliver with speed, precision, and full visibility, <bold>around the clock.</bold>
ServicesCTA.cardDescription: Priority handling, real-time updates, and dedicated experts for your most critical moves, <bold>anywhere in the world.</bold>

Footer.followText: Stay connected with us for logistics insights and updates:
Footer.copyright: © {year} OBC Care e.K. All rights reserved.

ServicesBanner.title:
Delivering Precision-Driven
Logistics Solutions
ServicesBanner.description: For time-critical shipments across the globe — from AOG and automotive parts to electronics and industrial components.

header.label: Our Core Services
header.title:
Priority
Logistics Solutions
header.p1: At OBC Care, we understand that <bold>downtime costs money</bold>. That's why we provide priority logistics solutions tailored for industries that demand speed, security, and global reach.
header.p2: Our expertise ensures that every shipment — big or small — arrives <green>safely, swiftly, and seamlessly</green>.

0.title: First Mile / Last Mile (FM/LM) Delivery
0.description: Seamless pickup and delivery from origin to final destination.

1.title: Onboard Courier (OBC) Service
1.description: When every second counts, our professional couriers personally escort your shipment with utmost priority.

2.title: Customs Clearance Assistance
2.description: We simplify the complex. Our customs experts handle every detail of international customs coordination.

3.title: Next Flight Out (NFO) Solutions
3.description: When speed is everything, NFO ensures your shipment takes off on the next available flight.

header.label: How We Operate
header.title:
Efficient Process,
Transparent Results
header.p1: At OBC Care, <bold>every minute matters</bold>. That's why our process is designed to be efficient, transparent, and fully customized for your shipment's urgency, route, and industry.
header.p2: Here's how we make it happen:

0.title: Request & Assessment
0.description: Submit your shipment details — our operations team will evaluate the fastest route and provide a quote within 15 minutes.

1.title: Booking & Documentation
1.description: Once confirmed, we book all flights and prepare all necessary paperwork, including customs documentation, to ensure a smooth transport.

2.title: Collection & Handover
2.description: A trained courier picks up your shipment and prepares it for departure.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: From pickup to delivery, we send live status updates at every milestone.

4.title: Final Delivery Confirmation
4.description: Once your shipment arrives, you'll receive instant proof of delivery — safely and on time.

header.label: Flexible Delivery Options
header.title: Built for Every Route and Requirement
header.description: We tailor each transport solution to fit your operation's needs — whether it's time-critical, sensitive, or high-value cargo.

door-to-door.title: Door-to-Door
door-to-door.description: Complete pickup and delivery from sender to receiver — full convenience, zero hassle.

airport-to-airport.title: Airport-to-Airport
airport-to-airport.description: Ideal for international freight — coordination from origin to destination airports efficiently.

door-to-airport.title: Door-to-Airport
door-to-airport.description: Perfect for shippers sending goods abroad — we handle local pickup, packaging, and airline dispatch.

airport-to-door.title: Airport-to-Door
airport-to-door.description: We take over once your shipment lands — handling customs and fast last-mile delivery to your receiver.

header.label: How We Move Your Shipments
header.title: Fast. Secure. Global.
header.description: Every delivery is different — that’s why we customize our logistics approach for efficiency and precision.

air.title: Air Transport (Onboard & Cargo Flights)
air.description: Our couriers travel with or coordinate your shipment via the fastest route available, ensuring priority handling and zero delays.

ground.title: Ground Transport
ground.description: For short or regional routes, we provide direct, door-to-door ground delivery with GPS tracking and standby drivers for continuous movement.

items.1: Secure handling and custody at every transfer point
items.2: Verified couriers and partner checks for full accountability

ShipmentMethods.imageCaption: OBC missions, FM/LM or NFO in action — priority handling worldwide.
